scripts.install:all: concurrently -n ROOT,FRONTEND,BACKEND,INFRASTRUCTURE -c blue,cyan,green,magenta "npm install" "npm --prefix frontend install" "npm --prefix backend install" "npm --prefix infrastructure install"
scripts.build: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND "npm run frontend:build" "npm run backend:build"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,BACKEND "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run backend:watch"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm --prefix infrastructure run deploy
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run frontend:build && npm --prefix infrastructure run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run backend:build && npm --prefix infrastructure run deploy:backend
